Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you based on your needs and interests. After careful consideration, I am offering this exceptional item to you at a special introductory price of $12000. This represents an excellent value considering its market worth and the benefits it offers. I am confident it will meet and exceed your expectations. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you wish to proceed with the purchase. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $12,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $12,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
